## Current Research Projects

-   *Attitudes on Science and Scientific Quality of Finnish University Professors*. Doctoral thesis in Sociology, Åbo Akademi University. Financing by the Waldemar von Frenckell Foundation and the Kone Foundation.
-   Affective risk and psychological networks, with Alisa Puustinen & Jan-Erik Johanson.
-   *Emergency Services Zero Tolerance to Discrimination and Harassment - Fact or Fiction?* Project manager and principal investigator of research project at Pelastusopisto - Emergency Services Academy Finland. Financing by the Fire Safety Fund (Palosuojelurahasto).
